product_name: Icebreaker GT Technical 150 Relay Tank Top - Men's
long_description: Made with moisture-wicking, odor-resistant merino wool, the Icebreaker GT Technical 150 Relay Tank Top for men excels during fast-paced activities at any time of year. Made of soft, non-irritating merino wool with a touch of spandex for stretch, this Icebreaker top dries quickly, wicks moisture and resists odors naturally. With a UPF rating of 50+, the tank offers very good protection from UV light. Flat seams reduce chafing; machine washable.
short_description: Made with moisture-wicking, odor-resistant merino wool, the Icebreaker GT Technical 150 Relay Tank Top for men excels during fast-paced activities at any time of year.
